title: Algunas molestias en los accesos directos
content: En algunos casos cuando busco algo en Firefox, algunas busquedas se me quedan en los accesos directos ¿Que hago?
creator: gamez1901

title: App login issue
content:
Using desktop PC with Roku device and Firefox as default browser, V140 / Win10. I don't know if there was a recent update, but I can no longer access tv.apple.com through Roku. I am able to enter my username and password when signing in to tv.apple.com on desktop, but no 2SV window appears and an empty sign-in form appears again, as if my sign-in info is not recognized. Signing in on a laptop with Firefox browser is successful. Signing in on desktop PC through Firefox "Private Window" is successful as well. What settings on desktop PC changed, and how can I fix this?

Thanks.
creator: patnik98

title: My Firefox homepage
content: How to delete tabs on my home page that I’ve never gone to or even opened. Like a T- Mobile tab?
creator: donna.liebel

title: UFC site
content:
Why am I getting a 403 Forbidden message when I'm trying to access www.UFC.com, the Ultimate Fighting Championship website??? This site is save in my Bookmarks and I've not had previous issues! Be advised that I tried to access it on MS Edge and had no problem at all!!! If this continues, or if more sites are "Forbidden", I'll happily scrap your server platform!

Carl Piper carlpiper5@gmail.com Firefox user for more than a 2 decades!
creator: carlpiper5
